title: Pedantius Comœdia, olim Cantabrig. acta in Coll. Trin. Nunquàm antehàc typis evulgata.
author: Forset, Edward, 1553?-1630, attributed name.
publisher: Excudebat W[illiam] S[tansby] impensis Roberti Mylbourn in Cœmeterio Paulino ad insigne Canis Leporarij,
notes: Variously attributed to Edward Forset, to Anthony Wingfield, to Walter Hawkesworth, and to Thomas Beard.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
